markdownRemark.html: There’s a spark, there’s a flame. There’s a dream, there’s reality. There’s what once was, there’s what’s now, there’s what could be. There’s happiness, there’s joy springing from the heart. There’s disappointment, there’s a reunion. There’s ego, there’s vengeance, there’s sympathy. There’s hope, there’s betrayal, there’s convergence. There are qualms, there are doubts, there are moments of purity. There’s a delusion, there’s expectation, there’s acceptance. There’s hope, there’s an instinct, there’s destiny.
